attributes.action: Accelerate the plan to deliver high speed Internet access to the countryside
attributes.additional_details: Personally I find that calling 2 mbs download and 0.5 mbs upload to be a joke and false advertising from ISPs. Fiber-optic Internet must be made more widely available or Britain will fall further behind the rest of the developed world for Internet connectivity.
attributes.background: For many people in rural areas the speed of their Internet connection can be very limiting. From trying to play a game online or watching a film to working from home or uploading school work, many actions that people living in towns and cities take for granted can be impossible in more rural areas.
